#summary How to compile python tesseract for Fedora19

=How to compile python-tesseract for Fedora=
==Compile leptonica==
{{{
yum groupinstall "Development Tools" -y
yum install swig gcc-c++ leptonica -y
yum install giflib-devel libtiff-devel zlib-devel libpng-devel libjpeg-turbo-devel python-devel tesseract-devel opencv-devel -y 

}}}
